text: Mbe vhɨra harigi gumgir zɨrir farfav, mbe shɨshɨgi bunin mbe nzuai. Mbe vhɨra panara thav Fhe Bakɨme garav, fhura tuava purav, ndikndigap surav, harigi gumgi mbevav, kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, “Nza fegi ma.” Mbe vhɨra wari wo zɨri ndi vun kuamkuagi. Mbe maaŋ mbuav, mbe vhɨra tɨvi mbatɨgir ŋkaa, mbe nta ndiav nta mbui. Mbe maaŋ mbuav wari won ndegi gu ndegmbori nzuai buni, mbe nta daasui.
